frontmatter.title: Do you want to be a Programmer?
frontmatter.desc: In this article, you can read about what a programmer does, your possible jobs as a developer, and the average salary per year for each occupation. Besides, the most popular languages in the software industry and the skills that every programmer should have.
frontmatter.phrase: The computer programmer is a creator of universes for which he alone is the lawgiver. No playwright no stage director, no emperor, however powerful, has ever exercised such absolute authority to arrange a stage or field of battle and to command such unswervingly dutiful actors or troops.
frontmatter.author: Joseph Weizenbaum
